sentences.english: They are strictly vegetarian and eat all manner of deep fried food.
sentences.chinese: 他們是嚴格的食素者，喫各種各樣的油炸食品。

sentences.english: A bowl-shaped desert island inhabited by a variety of monsters.
sentences.chinese: 狹長的沙漠島，息居着各種各樣的怪獸。

sentences.english: So get all sources of sweets, deserts and sugar out of your house.
sentences.chinese: 把各種各樣的糖果，甜點和其他糖移出你的房間。

sentences.english: All kinds of things go on in these baths.
sentences.chinese: 浴室會發生各種各樣事情。

sentences.english: People catch all kinds of infections in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 人們在冬天易患各種各樣的傳染病。

sentences.english: So, Langer applied for various jobs in education, but with very little success.
sentences.chinese: 所以蘭格申請了各種各樣的教育工作，但是成就有限。

sentences.english: These eave tiles are carved with many animal pictures.
sentences.chinese: 這些瓦當上都刻有各種各樣的動物圖案。

sentences.english: and all kinds of science things you can play with, so.
sentences.chinese: 還有各種各樣的科技產品你可以玩。

sentences.english: The town offers many shops and cafes and a wide variety of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 鎮上有許多商店和咖啡館以及各種各樣的文娛活動。
我們有各種各樣的光線。

sentences.english: All sorts of fine-sounding schemes were brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 各種各樣動聽的計劃給提了出來。

sentences.english: Peole don't want to grow up because of the various pressures and non-freedom.
sentences.chinese: 人們不想長大，因爲各種各樣的壓力和不自由。

sentences.english: She's very good at dealing with all kinds of people; she never puts a foot wrong.
sentences.chinese: 她善於與各種各樣的人打交道，從來不出紕漏。

sentences.english: In summer, all kinds of trees grow tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天，各種各樣的樹長得又高又壯。

sentences.english: There is all kind of furnishing in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 這家商店有各種各樣的服飾品。

sentences.english: The hotel offers its guests a wide variety of amusements.
sentences.chinese: 這個旅館爲住客提供了各種各樣的娛樂活動。

definition: every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
